text: 1995 FIFA World Youth Championship was held in Qatar from 13 to 28 April. ==Qualification== Confederation Qualifying Tournament Qualifier(s) AFC (Asia) Host nation AFC (Asia) 1994 AFC Youth Championship CAF (Africa) 1995 African Youth Championship CONCACAF (North, Central America & Caribbean) 1994 CONCACAF U-20 Tournament CONMEBOL (South America) 1995 South American Youth Championship OFC (Oceania) 1994 OFC U-20 Championship UEFA (Europe) 1994 UEFA European Under-18 Football Championship :1.Teams that made their debut. ==Results== RSSSF ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 8 0 +8 7 align=left 3 1 2 0 3 1 +2 5 align=left 3 1 0 2 1 8 -7 3 align=left 3 0 1 2 1 4 -3 1 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 13 5 +8 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 5 4 +1 4 align=left 3 0 2 1 6 9 -3 2 align=left 3 0 1 2 2 8 -6 1 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 7 2 +5 9 align=left 3 2 0 1 5 3 +2 6 align=left 3 1 0 2 7 5 +2 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 5 14 -9 0 ====Group D==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 7 4 +3 7 align=left 3 1 1 1 5 4 +1 4 align=left 3 1 0 2 3 6 -3 3 align=left 3 0 2 1 3 4 -1 2 ===Knockout stage=== ==References== Category:1990s in Asian sports Category:1995 in association football Category:International association football competitions hosted by Qatar Category:April 1995 events Category:FIFA World Youth Championship Category:1995 in Asia Category:1990s in Qatar
